summary: The implementation successfully removes API key requirements and adds web search functionality to both image and video tabs in the MediaDisplay component. The changes align well with all three requirements, providing API-keyless search for both media types with unified interface and automatic search triggering.

hallucinated_features.description: Video playback dialog with Play button and video player interface
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 acceptance criteria specify displaying video previews/thumbnails and making videos viewable, but the implementation adds a modal dialog for video playback which goes beyond the basic requirement of making videos viewable in the interface

hallucinated_features.description: Image download functionality with Download button
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement specified download capabilities for images. REQ-1 only requires search and display functionality without authentication

hallucinated_features.description: Toast notifications for search success and download feedback
hallucinated_features.reason: User feedback via toast notifications was not specified in any requirement. The requirements focus on search functionality and display, not user notification mechanisms

hallucinated_features.description: Duration formatting and display for videos
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 specifies displaying video previews/thumbnails but does not require duration information to be displayed or formatted
